name: Madness and hunger
description:
This is a game about moving around the map and balancing between madness and hunger while eating disgusting food. You have characteristics and .         

You can use various things to increase one characteristic and decrease another. Here is a list of these things:                                                                                              

 Fish head 

Strange meat

 Monster tentacle

  Opium

Alcohol

Click or  to use the item in the inventory.

Press  or   to discard an item from inventory.

Use  or    to move the character.
